attributes.action: Erect a statue at London Bridge in recognition of the Bravery of Roy Larner.
attributes.additional_details: Roy single handedly fought off a terrorist onslaught at Borough Market which without doubt saved the lives of several people, Roy was stabbed several times and continued to fight off the terrorists enabling others to get away, his bravery has almost been ignored by the establishment which in my opinion is utterly disgusting, let’s all sign this petition to ensure Roy gets the recognition he undoubtedly deserves. HONOUR THE LION OF LONDON BRIDGE.
attributes.background: Roy deserves a lot more recognition for his remarkable heroism.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the granting of planning permission is a matter for the local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.
